content: **knitted hat / hipster-hat for men in drops alpaca the piece is worked bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-1010 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** m - l/xl fits head-size approx 56/58 - 58/60 cm height with fold-up 21-22 cm **yarn** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100 g colour 517 medium grey **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need an 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
